items.summary: Create a My Projects page (frontend/src/pages/MyProjects.tsx) for the Student Dashboard that displays all projects the student has applied to or is working on, with status indicators (Applied, In Progress, Completed), project details, and filtering options

Create a Skill Profile page (frontend/src/pages/SkillProfile.tsx) for the Student Dashboard that displays the student's skill strengths, certifications, and allows editing of skill data with save functionality

Create a Mentorship page (frontend/src/pages/Mentorship.tsx) for the Student Dashboard that displays mentor messages, allows sending messages to mentors, and shows mentorship requests with status tracking

Create a Settings page (frontend/src/pages/StudentSettings.tsx) for the Student Dashboard that allows students to update profile information, change notification preferences, and manage account settings

Create an Applicants page (frontend/src/pages/Applicants.tsx) for the Industry Dashboard that displays all students who have applied to the company's projects, with skill match percentages, filtering by project, and contact functionality

Create an Analytics page (frontend/src/pages/IndustryAnalytics.tsx) for the Industry Dashboard that displays project performance metrics, applicant statistics, engagement rates, and growth charts for the company's posted projects

Create a Settings page (frontend/src/pages/IndustrySettings.tsx) for the Industry Dashboard that allows industry partners to update company profile information, manage team members, and configure posting preferences

Create a Users page (frontend/src/pages/Users.tsx) for the Admin Dashboard that displays all registered users (students, industry partners, admins) with filtering, search functionality, and user management actions
Create a Projects page (frontend/src/pages/AdminProjects.tsx) for the Admin Dashboard that displays all projects posted on the platform with approval status, moderation tools, and analytics
Create a Revenue page (frontend/src/pages/Revenue.tsx) for the Admin Dashboard that displays platform revenue metrics, subscription data, payment history, and financial growth charts
Create a Reports page (frontend/src/pages/Reports.tsx) for the Admin Dashboard that displays platform activity reports, user engagement metrics, and export functionality for generating custom reports
Create a Settings page (frontend/src/pages/AdminSettings.tsx) for the Admin Dashboard that allows admins to configure platform settings, manage access controls, and update system preferences

Update frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx to replace the hardcoded sidebar links with proper React Router Link components that navigate to /student/my-projects, /student/skill-profile, /student/mentorship, and /student/settings

Update frontend/src/pages/IndustryDashboard.tsx to replace the hardcoded sidebar links with proper React Router Link components that navigate to /industry/applicants, /industry/analytics, and /industry/settings

Update frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx to replace the hardcoded sidebar links with proper React Router Link components that navigate to /admin/users, /admin/projects, /admin/revenue, and /admin/reports, and /admin/settings

Update frontend/src/App.tsx to add route definitions for all new dashboard pages including student routes (/student/my-projects, /student/skill-profile, /student/mentorship, /student/settings), industry routes (/industry/applicants, /industry/analytics, /industry/settings), and admin routes (/admin/users, /admin/projects, /admin/revenue, /admin/reports, /admin/settings) with proper ProtectedRoute guards
